page.description: If the grid is editable and the control type is editable, you may optionally suppress editing of the field that you view through the control. You may also set a minimum security level required to change the field's contents.

section.title: Updateable
section.description: Specifies whether the field can be edited.

section.title: Table alias
section.description: This property defines the alias of the table that contains the field.

section.title: Field to update
section.description: Specifies the field that binds to the control.

section.title: Security level
section.description: Specifies the minimum security level required to edit the contents of the field.

section.example: 'Updateable with tmpl.field_info[N] .Updateable as L 'Table alias with tmpl.field_info[N .Table_Alias as C 'Field to update with tmpl.field_info[N] .FieldToUpdate as C 'Security level with tmpl.field_info[N] .UpdateSecurityLevel as N
